casebody.data:
HAMLET H.M.A., LLC
v.
HERNANDEZ 425A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 17, 2019 Mark L. Hayes, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, for Hernandez, Pedro (M.D.). William S. F. Freeman, Attorney at Law, Rebecca C. Huntington, Attorney at Law, for Hamlet H.M.A., LLC D/B/A Sandhills Regional Medical Center. Linwood Jones, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for N.C. Healthcare Association. Ryan Y. Park, Deputy Solicitor General, K. D. Sturgis, Special Deputy Attorney General, Daniel Paul Mosteller, Attorney at Law, Laura H. McHenry, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 15th of May 2019 by Defendant: "Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of May 2019." Defendant shall have up to and including the 24th day of June 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. Davis, J. recused
